title: SLFP to support 21A on several points
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Sri Lanka Freedom Party has directed a letter to the Minister of Justice, Prisons and Constitutional Reforms Dr. Wijayadasa Rajapaksha regarding the 21st Amendment to the Constitution.

The Chairman of the party, former President Maithripala Sirisena has stated in the letter that he and the party will give their full support to the 21st Amendment to the Constitution, subject to several points;
FULL SPEECH: Special statement by Sri Lankan premier Ranil Wickremesinghe
